body_html: The problem is that, unless you use a debug build of Python, the extension it is compiled with -DNDEBUG, which makes asserts no-ops. That's why we introduced JIT_ASSERT and we should replace all regular asserts with that in this file
body_text: The problem is that, unless you use a debug build of Python, the extension it is compiled with -DNDEBUG, which makes asserts no-ops. That's why we introduced JIT_ASSERT and we should replace all regular asserts with that in this file
body: The problem is that, unless you use a debug build of Python, the extension it is compiled with `-DNDEBUG`, which makes asserts no-ops. That's why we introduced `JIT_ASSERT` and we should replace all regular asserts with that in this file
